statement: The refactor should explicitly restore the probe stage (fresh-window expert agreement) or fold it into a request-led scoring pipeline so calibration data required by the paper is captured and exported.
rationale: Blueprint-init includes 4_probe and paper.md depends on fresh-window probes; current code lacks 4_probe.
keyAssumptions: Probe data is still required for the current research questions.
validationCriteria: Blueprint plan includes probe generation and export fields for expert agreement.
critiquePoints: If probes are deprioritized or out-of-scope for near-term runs, this may be deferred.
questions: Should probes be an optional stage or a default gate for ECC/control tasks?
